name: @github/combobox-nav
description: Attach combobox navigation behavior to an input.

scripts.prebuild: npm run clean && npm run lint && mkdir dist
scripts.build-umd: BABEL_ENV=umd babel combobox-nav.js -o dist/combobox-nav.umd.js && cp combobox-nav.js.flow dist/combobox-nav.umd.js.flow
scripts.build-esm: BABEL_ENV=esm babel combobox-nav.js -o dist/combobox-nav.esm.js && cp combobox-nav.js.flow dist/combobox-nav.esm.js.flow
scripts.build: npm run build-umd && npm run build-esm
